name: HandUp PBC
description: Provider of a crowdfunding platform designed to raise money for homeless people. The company's crowdfunding platform connects the abundance of resources and support in the society with the capabilities of existing social service nonprofit and government organizations and helps people who are in need to become a member of the community where donors can directly contribute to these members, enabling nonprofits and donors in the community with a new, simple and direct way to make an impact on poverty.
one_liner: Provider of a crowdfunding platform designed to raise money for homeless people. The company's crowdfunding platform connects the abundance of resources and support in the society with the capabilities of existing social service nonprofit and government organizations and helps people who are in need to become a member of the community where donors can directly contribute to these members, enabling nonprofits and donors in the community with a new, simple and direct way to make an impact on poverty.
